title: Argo CD instance
subtitle: Describes the architecture and terminology used in the Argo CD Agent, detailing how agent-based GitOps communication and synchronization works between the control plane and workload clusters.

abstract.para: This document provides an overview of the Argo CD Agent architecture and explains how it differs from the traditional Argo CD architecture for managing multi-cluster configurations. It also describes the available agent modes and a few example use-cases.
